metadata.title: CVE-2024-7409 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the QEMU NBD Server. This vulnerability allows a denialof service (DoS) attack via improper synchronization during socket closurewhen a client keeps a socket open as the server is taken offline.

criterions.comment: qemu package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
